officerComment.text: We have received your complaint and assigned a team to investigate the issue.
officerComment.author: officer

adminComment.text: This issue has been escalated to the concerned department. Expected resolution within 48 hours.
adminComment.author: admin

statusUpdate.text: Work in progress. Our team is on-site addressing the issue.
